column4: Hi,Some month ago i copy file from my hard to ex hard disk to have backup of them, but now i find that i have 3 or some times more than 3 copy of same file, is there any software than can help me to delet the copy of files?
why can't you just delete the file from the file system explorer?
if it's 2 extra copies of a file, it should be easy to just go find them delete those... or did I miss something?
oh, ok, there are a lot of duplicate files. sorry, I misread you
